snippet.title: Playfield.Earth / Urban Management - Announcement & Concept Trailer
snippet.description:
Playfield.Earth / Urban Management is a completely new genre mix of city builder, political simulation, economic- and infrastructure management.
Based on real structures and data, you can manage, expand and change every village, every city and every agglomeration in the world, as you imagine it.  
You do not have to build a city from scratch, even if it is possible.
Contrary to popular city builders and according to reality, there are less functional-, or planning cities. Each settlement is unique and will convey that it has developed organically over many years, decades and centuries. 

PFE / Urban Management offers different sub-gameplays (game modes) that simulate all aspects of real urban planning, urban management and typical municipal politics:

City Planner - Real and pure City building in the Sandbox:
https://playfield.earth/en/gameplays-en/urbanmanagement/urban-management-city-planner

Traffic - Comprehensive traffic management with Citybuilding elements:
https://playfield.earth/en/gameplays-en/urbanmanagement/urban-management-traffic

Public Safety - Realistic emergency and crisis management in urban areas:
https://playfield.earth/en/gameplays-en/urbanmanagement/urban-management-public-safety

Society - Educational, cultural & social policy meets City Builder:
https://playfield.earth/en/gameplays-en/urbanmanagement/urban-management-society

Economy - Mixed genre of city building, business management & politics simulation:
https://playfield.earth/en/gameplays-en/urbanmanagement/urban-management-economy-infrastructure

Mayor - Next Generation Citybuilder & City Management Gaming:
https://playfield.earth/en/gameplays-en/urbanmanagement/urban-management-mayor

Municipal Government - Citybuilder & City Management Gaming in Multiplayer Mode:
https://playfield.earth/en/gameplays-en/urbanmanagement/urban-management-city-municipal-government

----------------------

PFE Pics:
https://www.instagram.com/playfieldearth/

PFE - Idea, Vision, World & Technology:
https://playfield.earth/en/basicsfeatures

PFF Roadmap & Devlog:
https://playfield.earth/en/roadmapdevlog

PFE Community:
https://www.reddit.com/r/playfieldearth/

Frequently asked questions:
https://playfield.earth/en/faq
